channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says tariff-funded dividend payments for Americans will begin next year
item.description: Trump promises $2,000 dividend payments to Americans from tariff revenue by mid-2026, as collections surge to $37.5 billion in fiscal 2026.

item.title: ‘In 2030, he’s not going to be the president’: Even Republicans are warning of Trump’s lame duck status as affordability, Epstein threaten to derail tenure
item.description: "You will have voted to protect pedophiles if you don’t vote to release these files, and the president can’t protect you then," Rep. Thomas Massie tol...

item.title: Judge threatens DHS program that lets states scrub noncitizens from voter lists

item.title: Girls’ Steep Decline In Desire For Marriage Is The Destabilizing Consequence Of Feminization
item.description: Feminism, abortion, the decline in Christianity, the normalization of cohabitation, and rising divorce all played roles in this phenomenon.

item.title: Arizona Republicans Introduce Constitutional Amendment To End Post-Election Day Counting ‘Chaos’

item.title: Companies need to take a human-centric approach to AI, experts say, as executives try to shift from experimentation to implementation
item.description: “For every dollar that we spend on technology, we should spend three more on people," said Gastón Carrión, Accenture's APAC lead of talent.

item.title: This Cisco exec started at the $306 billion company 30 years ago after interviewing for the wrong gig. It inspired her to fight for entry-level jobs

item.title: Pro-life pregnancy centers see client increase after Supreme Court decision: study

item.title: Don’t Let Anti-Immigrant Sentiment Turn America Against People
item.description: Don’t try to solve housing shortages or worker frustrations by having fewer Americans.

item.title: The Case for War Against the Venezuelan Regime
item.description: A prospect as weighty as war should be handled by the administration with the sobriety and earnestness it deserves.

item.title: FTC data confirms job offer text scams are 4 times more common now and have cost job seekers almost $300 million
item.description: Text scams have grown especially quickly in the last five years, with 20,673 reports last year compared with just 4,872 reports in 2020.

item.description: The Justice Department is in the business of investigating crime, not the business of conducting political opposition research.

item.title: Backlash over dead cat turns into movement to allow local bans of self-driving cars
item.description: Autonomous vehicle company Waymo is in hot water after one of its self-driving taxis ran over a beloved San Francisco bodega cat.

item.description: Republicans have a majority and are doing nothing with it.

item.title: Tennessee Teacher Who Mocked Charlie Kirk’s Assassination Got Her Job Back
item.description: Emily Orbison was reinstated on Nov. 11. She will receive back pay dating to Sept. 15, according to a district reinstatement letter.
